channel.title: Wagneric - Auxian Rhapsody [Polytonal Experimental Downtempo]
channel.description:
I'm calling this finished for now, but may well edit it down or revise it to death in the future: [Auxian Rhapsody](https://soundcloud.com/wagneric/20180303-auxian-rhapsody-v0-3)
It's R&D for a new piano rhapsody I'm working on. If you'd like some background, here's a vintage recording of me playing the last rhapsody I wrote for piano at age 11 (right before I quit for a few decades): [Rhapsody for Piano](https://soundcloud.com/wagneric/1981-eric-wagner-rhapsody-for-piano)
